problem: Analyze whether AI interview prep tools are a good startup idea in South Asia

subtasks.task: Conduct market research on the demand for interview prep tools in South Asia
subtasks.expected_output: A report on the current market size, growth potential, and target audience for interview prep tools in South Asia

subtasks.task: Analyze the competitive landscape of AI-powered interview prep tools in South Asia
subtasks.expected_output: A comprehensive analysis of existing AI-powered interview prep tools, their strengths, weaknesses, and market share in South Asia

subtasks.task: Validate the effectiveness of AI interview prep tools in improving interview outcomes
subtasks.expected_output: A data-driven report on the efficacy of AI interview prep tools in enhancing interview performance and outcomes

subtasks.task: Assess the technical and infrastructure requirements for developing and deploying AI interview prep tools in South Asia
subtasks.expected_output: A technical report on the requirements, challenges, and costs associated with developing and deploying AI interview prep tools in South Asia

subtasks.task: Evaluate the potential revenue models and monetization strategies for AI interview prep tools in South Asia
subtasks.expected_output: A report on the viable revenue models, pricing strategies, and monetization approaches for AI interview prep tools in South Asia

rationale: This breakdown is chosen because it covers the key aspects of evaluating a startup idea, including market demand, competitive landscape, technical feasibility, effectiveness, and revenue potential. Each subtask is designed to provide a specific output that will inform the overall assessment of the startup idea.
